Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 32 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 15 Slashing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Nalfeshnee uses Horror Nimbus if it can.  It then makes 3 attacks, one with its bite and two with its claws
Other Actions.Action 2: Horror Nimbus, The Nalfeshnee emits magical, scintillating multicolored light.  Each creature within range and can see the light makes a Wisdom saving throw or be frightened by the Nalfeshnee
Other Actions.Action 3: Teleport, The Nalfeshnee magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see

Abilities.Ability 1: Magic Resistance, The Nalfeshnee has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects

Damage Resistances.Damage 4: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks
